backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, habits, activity entries, detected patterns, programs, and access-controlled CRUD operations with blob storage support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their purpose and role in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and base CSS resets.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/analysis/detectPatterns.ts: Heuristic keyword-based pattern detection producing pattern types, confidence scores, and text snippets.
frontend/src/analysis/patternTypes.ts: Static definitions and labels for the supported pattern categories used in analysis.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application managing authentication, view routing, onboarding, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication, with loading state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting the user to enter a name and submit a profile creation request with validation.
frontend/src/components/common/AccessDen: Full‑screen access denied view prompting unauthenticated users to log in.
frontend/src/components/entries/AddEntry: Form for creating a new activity entry with text, source, optional notes, and an optional image upload.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesL: Displays a sortable list of activity entries with previews and navigation to add or view details.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntryDet: Shows full details of a single entry, including notes, metadata, image attachments, and an analysis trigger.
frontend/src/components/habits/HabitLibr: Loads and displays a categorized habit library, auto‑seeding it if empty.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, navigation bar, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Displays a welcome dialog explaining how to add data, discover patterns, and start a 30‑day habit program.
frontend/src/components/patterns/Pattern: Shows detected behavioral patterns, summary stats, and top pattern types with 7‑ and 30‑day filters.
frontend/src/components/patterns/RunAnal: Runs local text pattern analysis and saves detected patterns while showing loading and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/program/ProgramD: Displays detailed info for a single program day including task details, rationale, and any check‑in data.
frontend/src/components/program/ProgramV: Manages viewing and generating the 30‑day program and navigating to individual day details.
frontend/src/components/today/ProgressSu: Shows overall program stats including completed days, current streak, and average mood.
frontend/src/components/today/TodayCheck: Handles the daily check‑in form, loading existing check‑ins, and displaying completion or program‑missing states.
frontend/src/data/habitLibrary.ts: Defines a static library of Habit objects grouped by category with metadata like duration, difficulty, and rationale.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls into React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, activity entries, patterns, habits, and programs.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark CSS variables for colors, borders, and theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
Generates statistics and summaries from recent pattern data, including counts, confidence averages, and common snippets.
frontend/src/program/generateProgram.ts: Builds a 30‑day habit program by mapping patterns to categories, selecting habits, and adding explanations and reflection prompts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), storing them in sessionStorage, retrieving persisted values, and clearing parameters from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, goals, architectural notes, image requirements, and existing feature definitions for the MVP self-improvement app.
